article: There are 45 students in our class. I have made a survey. 36 students  _ they like to exercise.  Most boys play basketball twice a week.  _ , girls think basketball is difficult for them. They'd like to play volleyball twice a week. My friend, Tony, is good at  _  He runs  the fastest in our class. He runs _    30 minutes on the playground every evening  _  he goes to bed. Is it interesting? Gray is good at swimming. He goes to the _ club three times a month in winter, and three times a week in summer  So he's pretty  _ . Some of  my classmates have good eating habits. They eat _  meat and  _ .70% of them  drink  milk every day. 15 students say they drink milk three or four times a week.
